author: Football Italia Staff
description: Ten years on, Football Italia looks back at the night Filippo Inzaghi laid the Istanbul ghosts to rest.
title: On This Day 2007: Milan 2-1 Liverpool

author: Football Italia Staff
description: Carlo Ancelotti confirms Milan wanted Liverpool in the 2007 Champions League final “to take revenge for Istanbul”.
title: Ancelotti: ‘We wanted Liverpool’
